note: I'm in love with testing 8) It started many years ago. Firstly, it was just computer science fascination. I've started to test apps I used in my daily workflow. But it wasn't enough. I've begun to test software used not by me, but my family, friends, colleagues, bosses and neighbors. Things got worse. Compulsively, I was testing not only software but also hardware. Then started to test food, sporting activities, my body and reality :)
